title: All the Good Ones Are Married

sources.title: All The Good Ones Are Married | Full Movie | Tense Drama | Daryl Hannah
sources.description:
All The Good Ones Are Married - Ben Gold gets the break of his life as aspiring author, but must stay home with his kids, Luke and Madison, to make his 5 months deadline. His feminist wife, workaholic fashion executive Alex, selfishly decides to take in promising rebel designer Zoe Miller, who left her boyfriend Trey. The 20s something woman soon wins the family's hearts.Â  
2007.  Stars: Daryl Hannah, Joanna Douglas, James McGowan
